name: BLUGGER
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Your arcane experiments have gone out of control. Capture the Blugger before the King notices, or he'll have your head!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Mouse - Aim Camera
Left Click - Force Push (Hold to Charge)
Right Click - Grab (Hold to Charge)

Press [ESC] at any time to Quit

GOAL:

Grab the Blugger and return it to the cauldron before the King notices.

Use your force push to send the Blugger and obstacles (and even the King) flying.

Use your grab to move the Blugger back where it belongs (but be careful not to lose your grip).

Music and Sound:
Select pieces from The Four Seasons (Vivaldi) performed by John Harrison with the Wichita State University Chamber Players
